text: Janssen Pharmaceuticals is a Belgian pharmaceutical company. Company is headquartered in Beerse, Belgium, and owned by Johnson & Johnson. Janssen Pharmaceuticals conducts research of a wide range of human medical disorders, including mental illness, neurological disorders, gastrointestinal disorders, HIV/AIDS, allergies and cancer. == History == Company was founded in 1953 by Paul Janssen. In 1961, Janssen Pharmaceuticals was purchased by American corporation Johnson & Johnson. == References == Category:Companies of Belgium Category:1953 establishments in Europe Category:1950s establishments in Belgium Category:Pharmaceutical companies of Europe
title: Janssen Pharmaceuticals
